verses.verse: When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, He went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> with His disciples <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the ravine <S%G5493><s%> of the Kidron, <S%G2748><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> there was a garden, <S%G2779><s%> into which <S%G3739><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> entered, <S%G1525><s%> and His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him, knew <S%G3609><s%> the place; <S%G5117><s%> for Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had often <S%G4178><s%> met <S%G4863><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with His disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> the [Roman] cohort, <S%G4686><s%> and officers <S%G5257><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> with lanterns <S%G5322><s%> and torches <S%G2985><s%> and weapons. <S%G3696><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the things <S%G3956><s%> that were coming <S%G2064><s%> upon Him, went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Whom <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%>?"

They answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene. <S%G3480><s%>" He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I am <S%G1510><s%> [He.]" And Judas <S%G2455><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him, was standing <S%G2476><s%> with them.
When <S%G5613><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I am <S%G1510><s%> [He]," they drew <S%G565><s%> back, <S%G3694><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground. <S%G5476><s%>
Again <S%G3825><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> He asked <S%G1905><s%> them, "Whom <S%G5101><s%> do you seek <S%G2212><s%>?" And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene. <S%G3480><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "I told <S%G3004><s%> you that I am <S%G1510><s%> [He]; if <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> Me, let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> their way, <S%G5217><s%>"

that the word <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He spoke, <S%G3004><s%> "Of those whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me I lost <S%G622><s%> not one. <S%G3762><s%>"

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sword, <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> it, and struck <S%G3817><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest's slave, <S%G1401><s%> and cut <S%G609><s%> off <S%G609><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> ear; <S%G5621><s%> and the slave's name <S%G3686><s%> was Malchus. <S%G3124><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Put <S%G906><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> into the sheath; <S%G2336><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> Me, shall I not drink <S%G4095><s%> it?"

So <S%G3767><s%> the [Roman] cohort <S%G4686><s%> and the commander, <S%G5506><s%> and the officers <S%G5257><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> arrested <S%G4815><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> Him,

and led <S%G71><s%> Him to Annas <S%G452><s%> first; <S%G4413><s%> for he was father-in-law of Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> that year. <S%G1763><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> was the one who had advised <S%G4823><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that it was expedient <S%G4851><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was following <S%G190><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and [so was] another <S%G243><s%> disciple. <S%G3101><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> that disciple <S%G3101><s%> was known <S%G1110><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and entered <S%G4897><s%> with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into the court <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%>

but Peter <S%G4074><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> at the door <S%G2374><s%> outside. <S%G1854><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> who was known <S%G1110><s%> to the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out and spoke <S%G3004><s%> to the doorkeeper, <S%G2377><s%> and brought <S%G1521><s%> in Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

The slave-girl therefore <S%G3767><s%> who kept <S%G2377><s%> the door <S%G2377><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "You are not also <S%G2532><s%> [one] of this <S%G3778><s%> man's disciples, <S%G3101><s%> are you?" He said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not."

Now <S%G1161><s%> the slaves <S%G1401><s%> and the officers <S%G5257><s%> were standing <S%G2476><s%> [there,] having made <S%G4160><s%> a charcoal <S%G439><s%> fire, <S%G439><s%> for it was cold <S%G5592><s%> and they were warming <S%G2328><s%> themselves; and Peter <S%G4074><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was with them, standing <S%G2476><s%> and warming <S%G2328><s%> himself.

The high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> questioned <S%G2065><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and about <S%G4012><s%> His teaching. <S%G1322><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, "I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world; <S%G2889><s%> I always <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> come <S%G4905><s%> together; <S%G4905><s%> and I spoke <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> in secret. <S%G2927><s%>

"Why <S%G5101><s%> do you question <S%G2065><s%> Me? Question <S%G2065><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who have heard <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them; behold, <S%G2396><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I said. <S%G3004><s%>"

And when He had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the officers <S%G5257><s%> standing <S%G3936><s%> by gave <S%G1325><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> a blow, <S%G4475><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is that the way <S%G3779><s%> You answer <S%G611><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, "If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> wrongly, <S%G2560><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of the wrong; <S%G2556><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> rightly, <S%G2573><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you strike <S%G1194><s%> Me?"
Annas <S%G452><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> Him bound <S%G1210><s%> to Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest. <S%G749><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> and warming <S%G2328><s%> himself. They said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, "You are not also <S%G2532><s%> [one] of His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> are you?" He denied <S%G720><s%> [it], and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not."

One <S%G1520><s%> of the slaves <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> a relative <S%G4773><s%> of the one whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> cut <S%G609><s%> off, <S%G609><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Did I not see <S%G3708><s%> you in the garden <S%G2779><s%> with Him?"
Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> [it] again; <S%G3825><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> a cock <S%G220><s%> crowed. <S%G5455><s%>

They led <S%G71><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> into the Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> and it was early; <S%G4404><s%> and they themselves <S%G846><s%> did not enter <S%G1525><s%> into the Praetorium <S%G4232><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that they might not be defiled, <S%G3392><s%> but might eat <S%G2068><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to them, and said, <S%G5346><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> do you bring <S%G5342><s%> against this <S%G3778><s%> Man <S%G444><s%>?"

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "If <S%G1487><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Man <S%G3778><s%> were not an evildoer, <S%G2556><s%> we would not have delivered <S%G3860><s%> Him up to you."

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Take <S%G2983><s%> Him yourselves, <S%G4771><s%> and judge <S%G2919><s%> Him according <S%G2596><s%> to your law. <S%G3551><s%>" The Jews <S%G2453><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "We are not permitted <S%G1832><s%> to put <S%G615><s%> anyone <S%G3762><s%> to death, <S%G615><s%>"

that the word <S%G3056><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He spoke, <S%G3004><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> kind <S%G4169><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> He was about <S%G3195><s%> to die. <S%G599><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into the Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> and summoned <S%G5455><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Are You the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Are you saying <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> on your own <S%G1438><s%> initiative, <S%G1438><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you about <S%G4012><s%> Me?"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> not a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> am I? Your own nation <S%G1484><s%> and the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> You up to me; what <S%G5101><s%> have You done <S%G4160><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "My kingdom <S%G932><s%> is not of this <S%G3778><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> My kingdom <S%G932><s%> were of this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> then My servants <S%G5257><s%> would be fighting, <S%G75><s%> that I might not be delivered <S%G3860><s%> up to the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> but as it is, My kingdom <S%G932><s%> is not of this <S%G1782><s%> realm. <S%G1782><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "So <S%G3766><s%> You are a king <S%G935><s%>?" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "You say <S%G3004><s%> [correctly] that I am <S%G1510><s%> a king. <S%G935><s%> For this <S%G3778><s%> I have been born, <S%G1080><s%> and for this <S%G3778><s%> I have come <S%G2064><s%> into the world, <S%G2889><s%> to bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> who is of the truth <S%G225><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> My voice. <S%G5456><s%>"

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "What <S%G5101><s%> is truth <S%G225><s%>?" And when he had said <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out again <S%G3825><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> guilt <S%G156><s%> in Him.

"But you have a custom, <S%G4914><s%> that I should release <S%G630><s%> someone <S%G1520><s%> for you at the Passover; <S%G3957><s%> do you wish <S%G1014><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that I release <S%G630><s%> for you the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>?"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they cried <S%G2905><s%> out again, <S%G3825><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Not this <S%G3778><s%> Man, <S%G3778><s%> but Barabbas. <S%G912><s%>" Now <S%G1161><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> was a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
